description:
Be one with the wild. This lightweight T-shirt uses no GMO seeds or toxic pesticides, benefits soil quality and biodiversity, and saves 27 gallons of water compared to a conventional cotton T-shirt.Ringspun organic cotton sourced from farms in the Texas Organic Cotton Marketing Cooperative.Taped shoulder seams retain their shape and prevent shrinking when washed.Screen-print inks are PVC- and phthalate-free.Fair Trade Certified™ sewing.Original artwork by 4th Avenue Graphics.

        Sustainability






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade








Organic








                      Organically grown content
name: Patagonia Back for Good Organic Shirt - Men's
